name: Luc Valencia
text: Well he did adhered to principle of meritocracy with his appointee for Press Secretary i.e., Atty Salvador Panelo - the highly experienced and highly skilled lawyer defending the mass murderer Ampatuans! He will definitely can make use of his service if Du30 makes good of his promise to massacre 100,000 within 3-6 months! /s
